<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script copies portal_url_suffix from Content Experiences to Content Publishing. If the Content Publishing property has been changed from its default value of 'esc', it is preserved and not overwritten.</description>
        <name>Copy CE portal suffix to CD</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function copyCEPortalSuffixToCD() {
    var sysPropCE = gs.getProperty('sn_ca.campaign.preview.portal_url_suffix', '');
    var sysPropertiesGr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
    if (sysPropCE && sysPropertiesGr.get(cd_CommonConstants.PORTAL_URL_SUFFIX_PROPERTY_ID) && sysPropertiesGr.getValue('value') === 'esc') {
        sysPropertiesGr.setValue('value', sysPropCE);
        sysPropertiesGr.update();
    }
}

copyCEPortalSuffixToCD();
]]></script>
